nodes.text: The Cross of Glory Walk was a path in the Leisure Garden part of Axial Park on Corellia, along which a number of holostatues were situated to celebrate the heroes of the Jedi Civil War who had won the Cross of Glory: Revan, Juhani, Canderous Ordo, Carth Onasi, Mission Vao, Zaalbar, Jolee Bindo and Bastila Shan.
